channel.title: Links on Dangling Pointers
channel.description: Recent content in Links on Dangling Pointers

item.title: Other blogs and links
item.description:
I wanted to add some kind of blogroll / links menu (that ancient thing from before twitter) to share interesting blogs or articles I bump into. But since I’m not really passionate about webdesign, any change to this website could take years (estimation based on actual numbers).

In the meantime, here are a few links that I value a lot:

  • Memory, Cache, CPU optimization resources: it’s a gist with links to a lot of really interesting articles. Thanks Omar.

  • Preshing on Programming: Jeff Preshing’s blog; lots of great articles about lock free programming (among other things).

  • Random ASCII: Bruce Drawson’s blog; profiling, debugging and floating point trivia.

  • Molecular Musings: Dev blog of the Molecule Engine / Stefan Reinalter’s blog. Best engine related blog I know.
